about.title: About NovaNest Venture
about.text: In NovaNest Venture, individuals will be trained based on their interests and capabilities. Necessary actions are taken at the NovaNest Acceleration Center to accelerate their unique abilities. Then, investment is made based on the investment priorities of developing the nurtured capabilities of individuals.

text.canada: 3308-3833 EVERGREEN PL, BURNABY BC V3J 0M2 Canada
